comments:
Compute the log of the Wishart distribution normalization term.

Parameters ---------- degrees_of_freedom : array-like of shape (n_components,) The number of degrees of freedom on the covariance Wishart distributions.

log_det_precision_chol : array-like of shape (n_components,) The determinant of the precision matrix for each component.

n_features : int The number of features.

Return ------ log_wishart_norm : array-like of shape (n_components,) The log normalization of the Wishart distribution.
